title: Do not skip performance testing
summary: We deployed without testing load. Under real usage, the system crashed within 2 days.

incident.what_happened: First production usage caused downtime due to untested scaling issues.
incident.root_cause: No performance or load tests done pre-deployment.

impact.description: System outage caused loss of client trust.

guidance.do_not_do: Do not launch without stress-testing critical flows.
guidance.do_instead: Run lightweight load tests on staging with realistic traffic patterns.
